item.title: 用户激增，DeepSeek 难以维持人工智能聊天机器人的在线运行
item.description: DeepSeek 表示，它正在调查在新用户急于下载中国人工智能聊天机器人后发生的中断服务和阻止注册的事件。【原文：DeepSeek said that it’s investigating an outage that disrupted service and prevented signups after new users rushed to download the Chinese artificial intelligence chatbot.】

item.title: 工党增税将推动英国向欧洲式国家靠拢
item.description: 英国不断增加的税收负担将使其财政收入达到欧洲其他国家的水平，这标志着工党新政府向欧洲大陆的大国迈出了决定性的一步。【原文：Britain’s rising tax burden is set to bring revenues in line with the level seen elsewhere in Europe, marking a decisive step under the new Labour government toward the bigger states seen on the Continent.】

item.title: 纽蒙特以 4.25 亿美元将加拿大矿山出售给发现银矿公司
item.description: 纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp. ）在收购纽克雷斯特矿业公司（Newcrest Mining Ltd.）之后，将推进资产剥离计划，以高达 4.25 亿美元的价格出售其位于安大略省的波丘派恩金矿。【原文：Newmont Corp. will sell its Porcupine gold mine in Ontario for as much as $425 million as it pushes ahead with a plan to offload assets following its acquisition of Newcrest Mining Ltd.】

item.title: 淡水河谷股价下跌 170 亿美元，铁矿石暴跌阻碍扭亏为盈
item.description: 中国经济疲软和铁矿石价格下跌导致淡水河谷公司股价下跌，使投资者对困扰世界顶级炼钢原料供应商之一的不确定性保持警惕。【原文：A weaker China economy and battered iron ore prices have helped drive down Vale SA’s stock, making investors wary of uncertainties plaguing one of the world’s top suppliers of the steelmaking ingredient.】

item.title: 斗山集团在布拉格启动首次公开募股，着眼于核能计划
item.description: 捷克蒸汽轮机制造商斗山斯柯达动力公司（Doosan Skoda Power AS）启动了首次公开募股，并在能源行业订单的推动下，展望了高股息和快速盈利增长的前景。【原文：Czech steam-turbine manufacturer Doosan Skoda Power AS launched an initial public offering, touting an outlook for high dividends and rapid earnings growth driven by orders from the energy industry.】

item.title: 英国养老金行业将支持释放盈余现金的计划
item.description: 据报道，英国养老金行业支持政府计划让企业动用目前被锁在主要雇员退休基金中的数十亿英镑盈余。【原文：Britain’s pensions industry is backing reported government plans to let companies tap the multi-billion pound surpluses that are currently locked up in major retirement funds for employees.】

item.title: 特朗普意外加征关税引发哥伦比亚股市大跌
item.description: 哥伦比亚比索暴跌，因为该国突然（即使只是短暂的）陷入了与美国的关税战，而美国是哥伦比亚长期的政治盟友和最大的贸易伙伴。【原文：The Colombian peso tumbled as the nation was suddenly, if briefly, thrust into a tariff war with the US, its longtime political ally and largest trading partner.】

item.title: 土耳其希望与沙特阿拉伯达成价值 60 亿美元的武器交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的土耳其官员透露，土耳其政府希望与沙特阿拉伯达成一项价值 60 亿美元的防务协议，沙特可能会购买军舰、坦克和导弹。【原文：Turkey’s government is hoping to reach a $6 billion defense deal with Saudi Arabia that could see the kingdom buy warships, tanks and missiles, according to Turkish officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纵横交错的石油贸易使特朗普的加拿大关税计划复杂化
item.description:
重新安排供应路线的难度意味着市场可能与以往大同小异，只是成本更高。【原文：

The difficulty of rerouting supplies means the market may look much the same — just with higher costs.

】

item.title: 印度央行采取措施通过购买债券增加现金
item.description: 印度央行将进行公开市场债券购买，并进行买卖互换外汇拍卖，以增加银行系统的流动性。【原文：India’s central bank will conduct open market bond purchases and undertake buy-sell swap forex auction to augment liquidity in the banking system.】

item.title: 微策略公司购买更多比特币，同时增加集资工具
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc）在宣布提前赎回可转换票据并批准增加授权普通股数量的计划后，购买了 11 亿美元的比特币。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. bought $1.1 billion of Bitcoin, after announcing plans for the early redemption of convertible notes and approving an increase to amount of authorized common shares.】

item.title: 中国制造的电动汽车受到贸易限制后，特斯拉和宝马起诉欧盟
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司（Tesla）和宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）起诉了欧盟行政机构，这是继中国汽车制造商起诉欧盟对进口电动汽车征收最高达 45% 的关税之后的又一诉讼案。【原文：Elon Musk’s Tesla and BMW AG have sued the European Union’s executive, adding to a flurry of cases by Chinese carmakers attacking tariffs peaking at 45% on imports of electric vehicles into the bloc.】

item.title: 兰特因政治风险和美国关税威胁领跌新兴市场
item.description: 由于南非两大执政党之间的政治分歧扩大，兰特兑美元汇率创下两周来最大跌幅，这加剧了人们对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税威胁的担忧。【原文：The rand fell the most in two weeks against the dollar as a political rift between South Africa’s two main governing parties widened, adding to growing concerns about US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "星际之门 "项目距离富士康威斯康星州有一百万英里之遥
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将探讨名为 "星际之门"（Stargate）的人工智能基础设施提案，并指出在特朗普总统的第一个任期内，一个备受瞩目的科技项目并没有达到预期目标。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at the AI infrastructure proposal called Stargate and points out that a much-heralded tech project during President Trump’s first term in office didn’t live up to its billing.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚摊牌后，特朗普的下一个关税大限将于 2 月 1 日到来
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普出于许多不同的目的威胁要征收大量关税。周日，他宣布对哥伦比亚征收25%的关税，理由是哥伦比亚反对美国对待被驱逐出境者的做法，随后他又打了退堂鼓。【原文：Donald Trump has threatened a lot of tariffs for many different purposes. And as he demonstrated Sunday when he announced, and then backed away from, 25% tariffs on Colombia for pushing back against US treatment of deportees, he’s willing to use them for non-economic reasons.】

item.title: 没有什么是确定的，只是逃避关税的现象会增加：经济日报
item.description: 这里是彭博新闻社美国经济团队的 Cécile Daurat 和 Nazmul Ahasan。今天我们将探讨关税规避问题。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：This is Cécile Daurat and Nazmul Ahasan from Bloomberg News’ US economy team. item.title: 英美资源集团在调查中被视为欧洲最大的并购目标
item.description: 随着交易热潮席卷整个采矿业，英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）成为欧洲采矿和冶金专家眼中 2025 年的潜在目标。【原文：Anglo American Plc is the top pick among European M&A specialists to be a potential target in 2025 as a renewed appetite for deals sweeps through the mining industry.】

item.title: 加纳在通胀压力升高的情况下延长利率暂停期
item.description: 加纳中央银行连续第二次维持关键利率不变，以抵御仍然过高的通货膨胀。【原文：Ghana’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged for a second time in a row to fend off inflation, which remains too high.】

item.title: 德国担心电池热潮将加剧电网拥堵
item.description: 德国将大型电池的推广作为清洁能源网络顺利运行的关键。然而，政府官员和输电运营商担心，如果管理不当，在错误的地点建造这些电池将会堵塞电网。【原文：Germany has touted the rollout of large batteries as key to the smooth running of a clean-energy grid. Yet there’s fear among government officials and transmission operators that building these in the wrong location will clog up the network if not properly managed.】

item.title: 布达佩斯市长旨在阻止欧尔班建设 "迷你迪拜 "的计划
item.description: 布达佩斯议会将于周三就一项提案展开辩论，该提案旨在停止匈牙利最大的房地产开发项目，其中可能包括建造欧盟最高的摩天大楼。【原文：The Budapest assembly will debate a proposal on Wednesday to halt Hungary’s biggest property development that may include the construction of the European Union’s highest skyscrapers.】

item.title: 泰国财政部长再次推动降息和泰铢走软
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）最新呼吁央行降低借贷成本，使泰铢 "更具竞争力"，以促进该国的主要出口和旅游业。【原文：Thailand’s Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira made his latest pitch for the central bank to cut borrowing costs and make the baht “more competitive” to boost the country’s key exports and tourism sectors.】

item.title: AT&T电话和互联网用户增长，业绩超出预期
item.description: AT&T Inc. 公布的第四季度业绩超过了华尔街的预期，其中移动电话用户和光纤互联网用户的增长好于预期，这主要得益于季节性促销和捆绑产品的推出。【原文：AT&T Inc. posted fourth-quarter results that beat Wall Street projections, including better-than expected increases in mobile-phone customers and fiber-based internet subscribers, driven by seasonal promotions and bundled product offerings.】

item.title: 小型股暴跌扩大印度股市跌势，恐惧指数创五个月新高
item.description: 周一，由于对经济放缓的担忧和不温不火的盈利打击了投资者的情绪，小型公司股价领跌国内股市。【原文：Shares of small-cap companies led the rout in the country’s broader equity market on Monday, as worries over economic slowdown and tepid earnings hurt investor sentiment.】

item.title: DeepSeek 是对收购美国大型科技公司的一次打击
item.description: 你今天早上听到的嗖嗖声是投机资金从科技股和更广泛的高风险投资中冲出的声音。【原文：That whooshing sound you’re hearing this morning is speculative money rushing out of tech stocks and risky investments more broadly.】

item.title: 伊拉克鲁迈拉油田火灾后日产量减少 30 万桶
item.description: 据一位官员称，伊拉克鲁迈拉油田上周发生火灾后，石油日产量仍减少了 30 万桶。【原文：Oil output at Iraq’s Rumaila field remains reduced by 300,000 barrels a day after a fire last week, according to an official.】

item.title: 特朗普的科技亿万富翁们在购买什么？
item.description:
在特朗普的就职典礼上，业界最有权势的人士都站在最前排，他们每个人都希望得到的不仅仅是一张参加新政府启动派对的邀请函。【原文：

The industry’s most powerful people were front and center at Trump’s inauguration, and each of them is hoping for something more than just an invitation to the kickoff party for the new administration.

】

item.title: 美联储通胀之战持续，美国工薪阶层求助于食品银行
item.description:
美国食品银行正面临着由生活成本紧缩引发的需求浪潮

。【原文：

US food banks are facing a wave of need driven by the cost-of-living crunch

】

item.title: CVC 向 PureHealth 出售价值 23 亿美元的医院集团股份
item.description: 阿布扎比的 PureHealth Holding PJSC 公司将从 CVC Capital Partners 手中收购一家希腊连锁医院的多数股权，这将进一步推动阿布扎比酋长国向医疗行业扩张，并使其经济摆脱石油而实现多元化。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s PureHealth Holding PJSC is buying a majority stake in a Greek hospital chain from CVC Capital Partners, bolstering the emirate’s efforts to expand into the sector and diversify its economy away from oil.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦降低利率以刺激经济需求
item.description: 巴基斯坦连续第六次下调基准利率，因为通胀降温为决策者提供了促进经济增长的空间。【原文：Pakistan cut its benchmark interest rate for the sixth straight meeting as cooling inflation provides space for policymakers to bolster growth.】

item.title: 印度 JSW 赢得矿山合同后进军铜矿业务
item.description: JSW 集团赢得了印度东部恰尔肯德邦（Jharkhand）国有印度斯坦铜业有限公司（Hindustan Copper Ltd.）两个铜矿区块的竞标，将其业务扩展到有色金属开采领域。【原文：JSW Group has a won a bid to secure two copper mining blocks in the eastern Indian state of Jharkhand from state-owned Hindustan Copper Ltd., expanding its business into mining of non-ferrous metals.】
